attributes.action: actually pay real attention and not lip-service to the e-petitions that get a large amount of signatures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the time of writing, the road tax petition has over 1.5 million votes, yet politicians are not going to take any note of it, because it's against the party line.

Restore some semblance of democracy, and pay attention to what the people actually want (in this, and all other successful petitions)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
